intro: Schizeilema colensoi, commonly known as the Colenso's schizeilema, is a species of flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the family Restionaceae, which includes many grass-like plants adapted to fire-prone environments. The plant is characterized by its narrow, grass-like leaves and small, inconspicuous flowers that bloom in spring. It is often found in rocky or sandy soils in fynbos vegetation. Due to its limited distribution and specific habitat requirements, it is considered a rare and endangered species.
